items.title: Biden bans offshore drilling across vast area of US
items.description: President Biden has announced a ban on offshore oil and gas drilling along most of America's coastline.

items.title: Justin Trudeau may quit within days, say Canadian media
items.description: The pressure has been building for months, with sinking poll numbers for the prime minister's ruling Liberal Party.

items.title: Hamas lists 34 hostages it may free under ceasefire
items.description: The list is released as new Israeli air strikes kill dozens in Gaza over the weekend.

items.title: Mozambique opposition leader says he will return home from exile
items.description: Venâncio Mondlane left Mozambique shortly before last October's elections, which he says he won.

items.title: 'Stressed' elephant gores Spanish tourist to death in Thailand
items.description: Blanca Ojanguren García was gored to death while bathing the animal.
